text: Whisper of Sin () is a 2007 Lithuanian drama movie directed by Algimantas Puipa and starring Rasa Samuolytė, Aleksas Kazanavičius, Nelė Savičenko, Kostas Smoriginas, Remigijus Sabulis. == Other websites == * Category:2007 drama movies Category:Lithuanian movies Category:Movies directed by Algimantas Puipa
title: Whisper of Sin
